content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (Position x=1-3, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (1,1) and (3,1)
- Two burner inserters at (1.5,2.5) and (3.5,2.5)
- Two output wooden chests at (1.5,3.5) and (3.5,3.5) containing iron plates

### Copper Plate Production Line (Position x=2-4.5, y=7-9.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (2,7) and (4,7)
- Two burner inserters at (2.5,8.5) and (4.5,8.5)
- Two output wooden chests at (2.5,9.5) and (4.5,9.5)
- Transport belt connecting furnaces (2.5,8.5 to 4.5,8.5)
- Additional burner inserter at (3.5,9.5) moving items between chests

### Copper Cable Production Line (Position x=11.5-14.5, y=11.5-14.5)
Consists of:
- Input wooden chest at (14.5,11.5) containing copper plates
- Burner inserter at (14.5,12.5)
- Assembling machine 1 at (14.5,14.5) producing copper cable
- Output burner inserter at (12.5,14.5)
- Output wooden chest at (11.5,14.5) containing copper cables

### Electronic Circuit Production Setup (Position x=21.5, y=11.5-15.5)
Consists of:
- Input wooden chest at (21.5,11.5)
- Burner inserter at (21.5,13.5)
- Assembling machine 1 at (21.5,15.5) for electronic circuit production

### Power Generation System (Position x=2.5-13.5, y=35.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (2.5,35.5) extracting water
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at (7.0,35.5) producing steam
- Steam engine at (13.5,35.5)
- Electric pole network distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Inserter placement and functionality errors
- Ensure there is a valid destination entity for inserters to drop items
- Current error: Inserter at (14.5,12.5) has no valid destination for items

### Resource shortage errors
- Ensure required resources are available in input inventories before production
- Copper cable production halted due to missing copper plates
- Electronic circuit production halted due to missing iron plates and copper cables

### Coal management errors
- Cannot insert coal when inventory is empty
- Ensure coal is available in inventory before attempting to fuel machines

### Fluid system connectivity errors
- Ensure offshore pumps are properly connected to the fluid network
- Offshore pump at (-5.5,26.5) is not connected to any fluid network
